body_html:
We are aware of this issue caused by numerical precision. Internally we are discussing a solution with a better tradeoff between numerical stability, memory and computation efficiency.

For now, please work around this issue by clamp the variance to zero, or a small positive value.

For now, please work around this issue by clamp the variance to zero, or a small positive value.
body:
We are aware of this issue caused by numerical precision. Internally we are discussing a solution with a better tradeoff between numerical stability, memory and computation efficiency. 

For now, please work around this issue by clamp the variance to zero, or a small positive value.
